result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Paul Lamb was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation today.
Concurrent with: 13CF123

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/costs to be paid through Clerk of Courts Office.  Bond to be applied.
Must provide DNA sample and pay surcharge.
May not possess/use firearms or body armor.

May not vote until civil rights are restored.  
May not hold elected office.  
Other rights may be lost until restored.
If not US citizen may face deportation.
Compas and follow through with recommendations.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Paul Lamb

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 13CF123 & 14CF200. Defendant Michael Paul Lamb in court with attorney Daniel James Chapman.  Daniel P. Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 1:40 pm.  
14CF200-Count 1 amended to misd bail jumping - 946.49(1a). Count 1-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty.

SENTENCING 13CF123 & 14CF200:  CT finds def elig for CIP & SA pgm.  No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other rights may be lost until restored.  If not US citizen face deportation.  May not possess body armor.

13CF123-Felony-w/h sentence, probation up to 2 yrs.  DNA sample-no surcharge.  $290.60 fine/costs.  If not paid during probation convert to civil judgment.  Order follow through w/ COMPAS.  120 days CT, banked/stay for use by probation.  37 days credit if revoked.

14CF200-w/h sentence, probation 1 yr - concurrent.  COMPAS, AODA.  $265.60 fine/costs.  DNA sample & surcharge.  Must report to probation today.  Bond to be applied.  2:29 pm adj.
